subject: Swimming
lead_paragraph: The Olympic champion Kirsty Coventry of Zimbabwe set the world record in the 200-meter backstroke in Columbia, Mo., breaking a mark that stood for 16 years. Coventry finished in 2 minutes 6.39 seconds, 0.23 seconds faster than the mark set by Krisztina Egerszegi of Hungary in August 1991.
